1.content: Enhance KCT Admin Hub Products Table with Sizing & Inventory Management
1.details: Transform the basic products table into a comprehensive inventory management system that supports size-specific tracking based on the user's Stripe product structure. Implementation includes database schema updates, enhanced React interface with size matrix views, and advanced inventory controls.

2.content: Database Schema Enhancement for Size-Specific Inventory
2.details: Modify Supabase database to support: 1) Product variants table linking products to sizes/colors, 2) Size-specific inventory tracking for suits (34S-54L) and shirts (14.5-18), 3) Color-only variants for products like suspenders, 4) Low stock alerts per variant, 5) Exclude ties (already complete)

3.details: Build modern React interface featuring: 1) Size matrix view showing inventory per size, 2) Advanced filtering by category/size/stock level, 3) Bulk inventory update tools, 4) Visual stock level indicators, 5) Quick add/edit product variants, 6) Integration with existing Analytics Dashboard design
